channel.title: [317][delta] Npc's moving? help?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i want 1 of my npcs to just move around a bit like they do in runescape and other rsps'
Here is an example code of one of my moving npcs from my autospawn.cfg:
[code]spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1[/code]
how would i make it so the npc is at 3213 3424 and moves around?
